intro: Everistia vacciniifolia var. nervosa, commonly known as the nervy everistia, is a rare and unique plant native to specific regions of Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its distinctive foliage, featuring narrow, elongated leaves with prominent venation patterns. The plant belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes a wide variety of shrubs and herbs. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in tropical and subtropical forests. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a conservation concern.
